title: Deutsche Asset Management named top fund policy provider for seventh consecutive time
body:
Deutsche Asset Management has won the most trophies – for the seventh time in succession – at the FinanzResearch Awards, recognising providers of fund-backed life and pension insurance in Germany.
Deutsche Asset Management came in first place in three of the five categories for asset managers, namely “Net inflows – asset managers”, “Number of customer relationships” as well as “Top volume funds”.
According to the Fund Policy Report 2017 by FinanzResearch, Deutsche Asset Management is the market leader in Germany by a significant margin with assets under management of EUR 37 billion and market share of almost 40%. The company in second place, in terms of assets under management, is a long way behind Deutsche Asset Management with a market share of only 12%.
Deutsche Asset Management also cooperates with no less than 54 insurance company partners, one of the largest collaborations in the industry. The Fund Policy Report 2017 is based on the 2015 annual reports of life insurance companies.
